Smokescreen/Grimmler/Firearm/Rex:



Grimmler shook his head, he had developed strange feelings in moments (due to 
Skulletron's mind tampering).  He was about to take a step forward, but shook 
his head.  He kneeled down, splashing some water in his face, the feelings 
going away for a cycle.  But he could tell they were already coming back, and 
they were even stronger.

---

Firearm looked to Skulletron.  "Get out of beast mode you idiot!" he yelled.  
"And apprehend the Pred." he ordered, taking a pair of energy cuffs out, 
tossing it in Skulletron's direction.  Rookie.

Rex frowned at Bright Blade.  He was skeptical, as usual.  Keeping his weapon 
raised, he heard Firearm yell, and looked to Skulletron.  "GET IN ROBOT 
MODE!" he ordered, still aiming at Bright Blade.

Smokescreen sighed.  Walking over to Bright Blade, weapon raised, he reached 
a hand out to her.  "Take my hand.  Get up.  Please.  If you do what we say, 
you won't be hurt." he smiled.
